name: Notion Workout Tracker
description: The Ultimate Workout Tracker is an easy-to-use Notion template that simplifies tracking your workouts and data. It will help you achieve your goals, without needing to be a Notion expert.By gamifying exercise, this system provides motivation to lose weight, get stronger, and have fun. Stop searching for the best system - it's right in front of you.Preview TemplateFeaturesBodybuilding Hub A complete list of exercises, sorted by muscular groups & machines Weight intensity formulas Progression
features: A complete list of exercises, sorted by muscular groups & machines; Weight intensity formulas; Progression; Gallery view, with gifs/images of the exercises; Running, Cycling, Swimming; Record your best times; Track your upcoming and past races; Track your reps and hold time for each exercise; Gallery view, with gifs/images of the exercises; Schedule all your workouts in an easy-to-use calendar
